title.rendered: Men`s Brand Navy California Splashes Dri-FIT Fly Shorts

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1483451863512{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]Celebrate your California Splashes fandom with these Speed Vent performance shorts! These shorts come in team colors and feature a printed California Splashes graphic on the front of the left leg. Two ventilated panels on the back legs along with ON Field technology make these shorts the perfect way to stay cool and comfortable while boasting your California Splashes pride.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][stm_icon_list list_type=”font” title=”fa fa-check”]

  • Material: 100% Polyester
  • Hydra Void fabric is water-resistant to help block out the elements by shedding water to keep you dry and comfortable
  • Size XL inseam measures approximately 10″
  • Two front pockets

[/stm_icon_list][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][stm_icon_list list_type=”font” title=”fa fa-check”]

  •  Vent holes at lower back legs and inseam
  • Machine wash
  • Officially licensed
  • Imported

[/stm_icon_list][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: Celebrate your California Splashes fandom with these Speed Vent performance shorts!
